description.value:
Seductive queen of shapeshifters, she claims dominion over the aspect of love and is willing to tutor mortals in how to find their partners through means both innocent and foul.

Edicts say what needs to be said, share only what needs to be shared, publicly support the power structure while privately doing what you please

Anathema let a truth stand between you and your goal, willingly harm an insect, reveal a shapeshifter to those that would prosecute it for that crime
